question: 羽
sourceAnswer:
<read>はね</read>|<read>は</read>:: feather/plume/down | wing | blade-(of-a-fan,-propeller,-etc.) | shuttlecock-(in-badminton) | shuttlecock-(in-hanetsuki) | arrow-feathers
<read>わ</read>|<read>ば</read>|<read>ぱ</read>:: counter-for-birds,-rabbits,-etc.

sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word is made up of a single kanji with nothing attached it uses the kun'yomi reading. You learned this reading with the kanji, so you should be able to read this.
